column5: Our home is inviting and cozy. We offer guests the second floor seclusion of 2 bedrooms (please note that the price of $40 per weeknight $50 weekend is PER ROOM. Each room is listed separately on Airbnb ), a living area, a gym and bathroom. Each queen room offers a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, wifi, television.
column8: It's our goal to make you feel at home
